title: runtime: flaky TestFinalizerType
body:
saw this once during all.bash on darwin/amd64.
have not seen again, never saw before. seems like a very rare flake.

# GOMAXPROCS=2 runtime -cpu=1,2,4
--- FAIL: TestFinalizerType-4 (4.01 seconds)
	mfinal_test.go:62: finalizer for type func(*runtime_test.Tint) didn't run
FAIL
FAIL	runtime	20.682s
